configuration.sqlCommand: DROP SCHEMA ${schema.postgresql} CASCADE; DROP ROLE IF EXISTS ${user.postgresql};
CREATE USER ${user.mysql} IDENTIFIED BY '${user.mysql.password}'; CREATE USER ${user.mysql}@localhost IDENTIFIED BY '${user.mysql.password}';
DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS ${dbname.mysql}; CREATE DATABASE ${dbname.mysql};

GRANT CREATE, DROP, ALTER, INDEX, CREATE ROUTINE, SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, EXECUTE, TRIGGER ON ${dbname.mysql}.* TO ${user.mysql}; GRANT CREATE, DROP, ALTER, INDEX, CREATE ROUTINE, SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, EXECUTE, TRIGGER ON ${dbname.mysql}.* TO ${user.mysql}@localhost;
REVOKE CREATE, DROP, ALTER, INDEX, CREATE ROUTINE ON ${dbname.mysql}.* FROM ${user.mysql}; REVOKE CREATE, DROP, ALTER, INDEX, CREATE ROUTINE ON ${dbname.mysql}.* FROM ${user.mysql}@localhost;
